I want to talk to you about one of the

about how I've experienced this very
dramatic Al in my own

traditionally surgeries have always

please go cut that that piece out so we

home we get a phone call I'm sorry once

positive there's still cancer in your

all that they need they may need another

so imag Imaginee that you make a

up not nothing will be specific there's
no specificity there so they added two

nothing get stuck down and the two
pieces are then linked by something that
can only may be cut if you have the

normal tissue can't cut it the the

Sentinal lymph node dissection has

came into our
treatment protocol the surgeon basically
looks for the single node that is the

and and then if that node has cancer the

is if the lymph node did not have cancer
the woman would be saved from having a
necessary surgery but Sentinal lymph
note the way that we do it today is kind
